name: Kaguya - Star Chaser
description:
Controls -
 wasd - move
 Left Click - heavy attack
 Right Click - light attack
 q - ranged attack
 Space - jump
 j - upgrade menu
esc - pause

The stars are vanishing, now it's up to the moon spirit Kaguya to reclaim them from the corrupted monsters plaguing the land. Collect stardust and defeat bosses to unlock new abilities in order to take on the vicious World Eater.
